extension
Class CycleDetector

java.lang.Object
  extension.CycleDetector

public class CycleDetector
extends java.lang.Object

This class checks the dependencies for cycles. If there are now cycles it returns the List of all Method's that will be run for testClass.

Author:
Lea Haensenberger (lhaensenberger at students.unibe.ch)

Method Detail

checkCyclesAndGetMethods

public java.util.List<java.lang.reflect.Method> checkCyclesAndGetMethods()
                                                                  throws InitializationError,
                                                                         java.lang.SecurityException,
                                                                         java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                                                         java.lang.NoSuchMethodException
The bottom nodes are searched. For all bottom nodes a depth-first search is made and every passed Method is added to the List of visited Method's. Per traversation, the edges of the dependency graph are saved and if you find an edge which you already passed, there is a cycle and an InitializationError is thrown.

Returns:
the List of all Method's to be run
Throws:
InitializationError - thrown if no bottom nodes are found or a cycle is found
java.lang.SecurityException
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
java.lang.NoSuchMethodException
